meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jen Fiero Pete Gittens Campbell Warner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6879.

td.p: Jen Fiero, a librarian from Jackson, Michigan
Pete Gittens, a stay-at-home dad and bartender from Brownsville, Minnesota
Campbell Warner, a military attorney originally from Rock Hill, South Carolina (whose 2-day cash winnings total $37,200)

tr.td: A THOREAU UNDERSTANDING
ANIMALS ALL AROUND
GEOGRAPHICAL HISTORY
WHISKEY
ON THE "ROCK"S
NO CHASER

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'From July 4, 1845 to Sept. 6, 1847, Thoreau made his home on the shore of this')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: From July 4, 1845 to Sept. 6, 1847, Thoreau made his home on the shore of this

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Don\'t ever forget that a herd of these African & Asian mammals is sometimes called a memory')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Don't ever forget that a herd of these African & Asian mammals is sometimes called a memory

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Kelly of the Clue Crew shows a map on the monitor.) In order to gain military advantage, the ancient Romans were the first to build roads like the Via Claudia Augusta across this mountain system between central Europe & Italy')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Kelly of the Clue Crew shows a map on the monitor.) In order to gain military advantage, the ancient Romans were the first to build roads like the Via Claudia Augusta across this mountain system between central Europe & Italy

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_4_1', 'clue_J_4_1_stuck', 'The "E" in the word is for whiskey from the U.S. & this island, such as Connemara; otherwise, enjoy "whisky"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The "E" in the word is for whiskey from the U.S. & this island, such as Connemara; otherwise, enjoy "whisky"

rock lobster

tr.td: Campbell
Pete

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Campbell
Pete
Jen
STAGE WHISKERS
(Alex: ...not "stage whispers".)
MUSICAL MEDICOS
AN "S"-ORTMENT OF THINGS
PIRATES OF THE CARIBBEAN
ON THE SQUARE
THAT'S DIFFICULT!
